message: Bob, I believe this product presents a unique opportunity for you, and I'm pleased to offer it to you for $1,150,000. This is a chance to gain a valuable asset worth considerably more to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $1,080,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to move a bit closer to your number, how about we settle at $1,120,000? I believe this reflects the true value of the product for both of us.
